column4: how can i change kubuntu to ubuntu??? i think that is the cause that my laptop gets hot and shuts down
you can install the ubuntu-desktop package, however it is very unlikely that it is the cause of your laptop's overheating.

i dont know anything else that can be, i was working on windows vista and it was perfect but i dont like windws vista, so i got kubuntu and its nice and everything but everytime i get a fullscreen it shuts down
if I had to guess, it's probably an issue with power management in the kernel, and that won't be changed by changing your desktop environment.
